TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit OperationResponse extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Abstract class that represents the response of a single query or create, update, or delete operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The `OperationResponse` class is used to hold information that is shared between the two response types, but this class is not intended to be used directly by a developer. Instead, this response object should be cast to the specific <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.QueryResponse> or <xref:System.Data.Services.Client.ChangesetResponse> type that includes additional operation specific data.

Docs.summary: Gets error thrown by the operation.
Docs.value: An <xref:System.Exception> object that contains the error.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This property is null if no errors are found.

Docs.returns: An <xref:System.Exception> object that contains the error.

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, contains the HTTP response headers associated with a single operation.
Docs.value: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> object that contains name value pairs of headers and values.
Docs.returns: <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> object that contains name value pairs of headers and values.

Docs.summary: When overridden in a derived class, gets or sets the HTTP response code associated with a single operation.
Docs.value: Integer value that contains response code.
Docs.returns: Integer value that contains response code.
